description: Using darkness and a bit of magic, you manipulate the shadows.
name: ambush

talents.info_text:
For an instant, your weapons turn into a shadow leash that tries to grab the target's weapon, disarming it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Shadow Leash

talents.info_text:
You reach out with shadowy vines toward your target, pulling it to you and silencing it for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns and dazing it for 2 turns.

The chance to hit improves with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Shadow Ambush

talents.info_text:
You take full control of your own shadow for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Your shadow possesses your talents and stats, has 56%, 62%, 66%, 68%, 70% life and deals 75%, 83%, 88%, 92%, 95% damage, -30% all resistances, -100% light resistance and 100% darkness resistance.

Your shadow is permanently stealthed (63, 79, 91, 101, 110 power), and all melee damage it deals is converted to darkness damage.

The shadow cannot teleport.

If you release control early or if it leaves your sight for too long, your shadow will dissipate.
talents.name: Ambuscade

talents.info_text:
You veil yourself in shadows for 4, 5, 7, 8, 8 turns, and let them control you.

While veiled, you become immune to status effects and gain 17%, 24%, 30%, 35%, 40% all damage reduction. Each turn, you blink to a nearby foe (within range 5, 5, 6, 7, 7), hitting it for 146%, 169%, 187%, 202%, 215% darkness weapon damage.

While this goes on, you cannot be stopped unless you are killed, and you cannot control your character.
talents.name: Shadow Veil

description: Inflict maximum pain to specific places on your enemies.
name: Called Shots

talents.info_text:
Strike your opponent in the knee (or other critical point in an ambulatory appendage) for 170%, 178%, 185%, 190%, 195% weapon damage, knocking them down (1, 1, 1, 2, 2 turn pin) and slowing their movement by 45%, 47%, 48%, 50%, 51% for 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns afterwards.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The slow effect becomes more powerful with your Cunning.
talents.name: Kneecapper

talents.info_text:
Employ a specialized sniping shot at a target.

This shot is focused on precision at long range and deals base 91%, 116%, 135%, 152%, 166% ranged damage with a bonus that increases with distance.

The ranged bonus is -49% (penalty) at point blank range, while at your maximum range of 10 it is 250%.

This shot will bypass other enemies between you and your target.
talents.name: Kill Shot

talents.info_text:
Fire three shots in quick succession at a vulnerable point on the target (usually the head).

Each shot deals 52%, 62%, 69%, 75%, 81% Ranged damage and will try to stun or increase the target's stun duration by 1.

These shots will bypass other enemies between you and your target.

The chance to stun increases with your Accuracy.
talents.name: Noggin Knocker

talents.info_text: Your mastery of called shots is unparalleled. and you gain 3%, 6%, 8%, 10%, 11% bonus critical chance and 10%, 14%, 17%, 20%, 23% critical damage with your Called Shots Talents. At rank 3 the cooldowns of all of your Called Shots Talents are reduced by 2 each. At rank 5 you gain 15%, 23%, 35%, 43%, 50% Physical resistance penetration with all Called Shot attacks.
talents.name: Sling Sniper

description: Teaches various talents to cripple your foes.
name: dirty fighting

talents.info_text:
You hit your target doing 45%, 56%, 64%, 70%, 77% damage, trying to stun it instead of damaging it. If your attack hits, the target is stunned for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Stun chance increase with your Accuracy.

If you fail to stun the target (or if it shrugs off the effect), you quickly recover; the use of the skill does not take a turn.
talents.name: Dirty Fighting

talents.info_text:
Your quick wit gives you a big advantage against stunned targets; all your hits will have a 18%, 30%, 41%, 51%, 60% greater chance of being critical.

Also, your melee critical strikes have 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18% chance to stun the target for 3 turns.
talents.name: Backstab

talents.info_text:
Using a series of tricks and maneuvers, you switch places with your target.

Switching places will confuse your foes, granting you Evasion (50%) for 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 turns.

While switching places, your weapon(s) will connect with the target; this will not do weapon damage, but on hit effects of the weapons can trigger.
talents.name: Switch Place

talents.info_text:
You hit your target, doing 145%, 164%, 179%, 191%, 202% damage. If your attack connects, the target is crippled for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns, losing 45%, 50%, 53%, 56%, 57% melee, spellcasting and mind speed.

The chance to land the status improves with Accuracy, and the status power improves with Cunning.
talents.name: Cripple

description: How to make your foes feel the pain.
name: lethality

talents.info_text:
You have learned to find and hit weak spots. All your strikes have a 2.78%, 4.62%, 6.24%, 7.72%, 9.11% greater chance to be critical hits, and your critical hits do 9.1%, 15%, 21%, 26%, 30% more damage.

Also, when using knives, you now use your Cunning instead of your Strength for bonus damage.
talents.name: Lethality

talents.info_text:
You hit your target, doing 110%, 123%, 132%, 141%, 148% damage. If your attack hits, you gain 19, 24, 29, 32, 36 armour penetration for 6, 8, 9, 10, 10 turns.

The APR will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Deadly Strikes

talents.info_text:
For 5, 7, 9, 11, 13 turns, you put all your will into your blows, adding 8, 23, 44, 63, 80 physical power to each strike.

The effect will improve with your Cunning and Willpower stats.
talents.name: Willful Combat

talents.info_text: Your quick wits allow you to reset the cooldown of up to 2, 4, 6, 7, 7 of your combat talents (cunning or technique) of tier 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 or less.
talents.name: Snap

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a deadly poison, inflicting 17, 20, 23, 25, 26 nature damage per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

The damage scales with your Cunning.

Every application of the poison stacks.
talents.name: Deadly Poison

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a numbing poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Poisoned creatures will deal 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 28% less damage.

The effects scale with your Cunning.
talents.name: Numbing Poison

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with an insidious poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 turns.

Poisoned creatures have their healing reduced by 37%, 46%, 53%, 58%, 62%.

The effects scale with your Cunning.
talents.name: Insidious Poison

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a crippling poison, inflicting 16, 18, 20, 22, 23 nature damage per turn for 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 turns.

Every time a poisoned creature tries to use a talent, it will have a 14%, 18%, 22%, 25%, 27% chance to fail and lose a turn.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
talents.name: Crippling Poison

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with a stoning poison, inflicting 13, 14, 16, 17, 17 nature damage per turn for 11, 9, 8, 7, 7 turns.

When the poison runs its full duration, the victim will turn to stone for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
talents.name: Stoning Poison

talents.info_text:
Coat your weapons with an arcane poison, inflicting 13, 14, 16, 17, 17 arcane damage per turn for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The resistances of poisoned creatures are reduced by 16%, 21%, 23%, 26%, 27%.

The damage scales with your Cunning.
talents.name: Vulnerability Poison

description: The knowledge of poisons and how to apply them to 'good' effects.
name: poisons

talents.info_text:
Learn how to coat your melee weapons, sling and bow ammo with poison. Each level, you will learn a new kind of poison:

  • Level 1: Deadly Poison
  • Level 2: Numbing Poison
  • Level 3: Insidious Poison
  • Level 4: Crippling Poison
  • Level 5: Stoning Poison

New poisons can also be learned from special teachers in the world.

Also increases the effectiveness of your poisons by 26%, 52%, 78%, 104%, 130%. (The effect varies for each poison.)

Coating your weapons in poisons does not break stealth.

You may only have two poisons active at once.

Every time you hit a creature with one of your weapons, you have a 26%, 33%, 39%, 46%, 52% chance to randomly apply one of your active poisons.

The chance to apply a poison lowers if the target is already poisoned.
talents.name: Vile Poisons

talents.info_text:
You hit your target, doing nature damage depending on the number of poisons on the target:

  • 0 poisons: 70%, 78%, 85%, 90%, 95%
  • 1 poisons: 150%, 167%, 180%, 191%, 201%
  • 2 poisons: 231%, 256%, 275%, 292%, 306%
  • 3 poisons: 311%, 345%, 371%, 393%, 412%

If you wield a bow or sling you shoot instead.
talents.name: Venomous Strike

talents.info_text:
Reduces the duration of all poisons on the target by 50%, but increases their damage by 190%, 218%, 239%, 256%, 270%.

The effect increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Empower Poisons

talents.info_text: When you kill a creature, all the poisons affecting it will have a 28%, 36%, 44%, 52%, 60% chance to spread to foes in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 3, 3.
talents.name: Toxic Death

talents.info_text: Rend your foe with every attack you do. All attacks now have a 25%, 42%, 53%, 60%, 66% chance of inflicting an additional 25%, 29%, 32%, 35%, 37% of your attack's damage in Bleeding damage, divided over ten turns.
talents.name: Lacerating Strikes

talents.info_text:
Learn to take advantage of your enemy's pain.

If your enemy is bleeding and attempts to attack you, their critical hit rate is reduced by 12%, 19%, 25%, 30%, 35%, as their wounds make them more predictable.

If you attack a bleeding enemy, there is a 9%, 13%, 17%, 20%, 23% chance that, for 4, 5, 5, 6, 6 turns, they are disabled as you take advantage of openings (reducing their movement speed by 19%, 23%, 25%, 27%, 29% and Accuracy by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22) or anguished as you strike their painful wounds (reducing their Willpower by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22 and their Cunning by 14, 16, 18, 20, 22).

The statistical reductions will increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Scoundrel's Strategies

talents.info_text: Quickly and quietly dash your way to the target square, if it is not blocked by enemies or obstacles. This talent will not break Stealth.
talents.name: Nimble Movements

talents.info_text:
Your abilities in sowing confusion and chaos have reached their peak. Now, even your most simple moves confuse your enemies, rendering their offense less effective.

Your Defense increases by 11%, 15%, 19%, 22%, 24%, and enemies have a 4%, 8%, 12%, 15%, 18% chance of targetting a random square within 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 squares of you.

The bonus to Defense will increase with Cunning.
talents.name: Misdirection

talents.info_text:
Channel raw magical energy into your melee attacks; each blow you land will do an additional 34, 45, 54, 62, 68 darkness damage and cost 2.00 mana.

The damage will improve with your Spellpower.
talents.name: Shadow Combat

talents.info_text: Your preparations give you greater magical capabilities. You gain a bonus to Spellpower equal to 21%, 28%, 35%, 40%, 46% of your Cunning.
talents.name: Shadow Cunning

talents.info_text:
You draw energy from the depths of the shadows.

While sustained, you regenerate 0.38, 0.65, 0.91, 1.16, 1.41 mana per turn, and your physical and spell attack speed increases by 3.0%, 6.1%, 8.9%, 11%, 14%.
talents.name: Shadow Feed

talents.info_text:
Step through the shadows to your target, dazing it for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns and hitting it with all your weapons for 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% darkness weapon damage.

Dazed targets are significantly impaired, but any damage will free them.

To Shadowstep, you need to be able to see the target.
talents.name: Shadowstep

description: Allows the user to enter stealth.
name: stealth

talents.info_text:
Enters stealth mode (power 36, 48, 57, 65, 71, based on Cunning), making you harder to detect.

If successful (re-checked each turn), enemies will not know exactly where you are, or may not notice you at all.

Stealth reduces your light radius to 0, and will not work with heavy or massive armours.

You cannot enter stealth if there are foes in sight within range 9, 7, 6, 5, 4.
talents.name: Stealth

talents.info_text:
When striking from stealth, the attack is automatically critical if the target does not notice you just before you land it.

Shadowstrikes do +21%, +43%, +59%, +73%, +86% damage versus a normal critical hit up to 3 grids away and then disminishes to 0% at distance 10.

These bonuses are guaranteed for spell and mind crits even if the target can see you before it hits.
talents.name: Shadowstrike

talents.info_text:
You have learned how to be stealthy even when in plain sight of your foes. You may attempt to enter stealth regardless of how close you are to your enemies, but success is more likely against fewer opponents that are farther away.

Your chance to succeed is determined by comparing 1.10, 1.79, 2.32, 2.76, 3.16 times your stealth power (currently 7, 12, 16, 19, 21) to the stealth detection of all enemies (reduced by 10% per tile distance) that have a clear line of sight to you.

You always succeed if you are not directly observed.

This resets the cooldown of your Stealth talent, and, if successful, all creatures currently following you will lose track of your position.

You estimate your current chance to hide as 100.0%.
talents.name: Hide in Plain Sight

talents.info_text:
You are able to perform usually unstealthy actions (attacking, using objects, …) without breaking stealth. When you perform such an action while stealthed, you have a chance to stay hidden.

Success is more likely against fewer opponents and is determined by comparing 0.57, 1.14, 1.58, 1.94, 2.27 times your stealth power (currently 3, 7, 10, 13, 15) to the stealth detection (reduced by 10% per tile distance) of all enemies that have a clear line of sight to you.

Your base chance of success is 100% if you are not directly observed, and good or bad luck may also affect it.

You estimate your current chance to maintain stealth as 100.0%.
talents.name: Unseen Actions

description: The knowledge of the dangers of the world, and how to best avoid them.
name: survival

talents.info_text:
You notice the small things others do not notice, allowing you to "see" creatures in a 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 radius even outside of light radius.

This is not telepathy, however, and it is still limited to line of sight.

Also, your attention to detail allows you to detect traps around you (63, 90, 110, 127, 142 detection 'power').

At level 3, you learn to disarm known traps (63, 90, 110, 127, 142 disarm 'power').

The trap detection and disarming ability improves with your Cunning.
talents.name: Heightened Senses

talents.info_text: Your cunning manipulations allow you to use charms (wands, totems and torques) more efficiently, reducing their cooldowns by 14%, 25%, 34%, 40%, 46%.
talents.name: Charm Mastery

talents.info_text:
You look at your surroundings with more intensity than most people, allowing you to see stealthed or invisible creatures.

Increases stealth detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90 and invisibility detection by 43, 59, 71, 81, 90.

The detection power increases with your Cunning.
talents.name: Piercing Sight

talents.info_text:
Your quick wit allows you to see attacks before they land, granting you a 34%, 35%, 36%, 37%, 38% chance to completely evade them and granting you 20, 33, 45, 56, 66 defense for 6, 8, 11, 13, 15 turns.

Duration increases with Willpower, and chance to evade and defense with Cunning and Dexterity.
talents.name: Evasion

talents.info_text:
Your Defense is increased by 5, 7, 10, 12, 15 for every adjacent visible foe, up to a maximum of +24, +51, +66, +76, +82 Defense.

The Defense increase per enemy and maximum Defense bonus will scale with your Cunning.
talents.name: Tactical Expert

talents.info_text:
When you avoid a melee blow from an adjacent foe, you have a 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56% chance to get a free, automatic attack against the attacker for 70%, 78%, 85%, 90%, 95% damage, up to 1.0, 1.3, 1.7, 2.0, 2.2 times per turn.

Unarmed fighters using it do consider it a strike for the purpose of stance damage bonuses (if they have any), and will have a damage bonus as a result.

Armed fighters get a normal physical attack.

The chance of countering and number of counter attacks increase with your Cunning.
talents.name: Counter Attack

talents.info_text:
Increases Defense by 25, 32, 37, 41, 44 for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns. When you avoid a melee blow, you set the target up, increasing the chance of you landing a critical strike on them by 16%, 19%, 22%, 24%, 26% and reducing their saving throws by 16, 19, 22, 24, 26.

The effects will scale with your Cunning.
talents.name: Set Up

talents.info_text: Systematically find the weaknesses in your opponents' physical resists, at the cost of 10% of your physical damage. Each time you hit an opponent with a melee attack, you reduce their physical resistance by 5%, up to a maximum of 5%, 20%, 25%, 35%, 40%.
talents.name: Exploit Weakness

description: The knowledge of trap laying and assorted trickeries.
name: trapping

talents.info_text:
Learn how to set up traps. You will learn new traps as follows:

  • Level 1: Explosion Trap
  • Level 2: Bear Trap
  • Level 3: Catapult Trap
  • Level 4: Disarm Trap
  • Level 5: Nightshade Trap

New traps can also be learned from special teachers in the world.

This talent also increases the effectiveness of your traps by 20%, 46%, 67%, 84%, 100% (The effect varies for each trap.) and makes them more difficult to detect and disarm (38, 54, 66, 76, 85 detection 'power' and 47, 67, 82, 95, 106 disarm 'power') based on your Cunning.

If a trap is not triggered 80% of its stamina cost will be refunded when it expires.
talents.name: Trap Mastery

talents.info_text:
Project a noisy lure for 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 turns that attracts all creatures in a radius 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 to it.

At level 5, when the lure is destroyed, it will trigger some traps in a radius of 2 around it (check individual traps to see if they are triggered).

Use of this talent will not break stealth.
talents.name: Lure

talents.info_text:
Throws a vial of sticky smoke that explodes in radius 0, 1, 2, 2, 3 on your foes, reducing their vision range by 1, 3, 4, 6, 7 for 5 turns.

Creatures affected by smoke bomb can never prevent you from stealthing, even if their proximity would normally forbid it.

Use of this will not break stealth.
talents.name: Sticky Smoke

talents.info_text:
Allows you to create self deploying traps that you can launch up to 1 grids away.

At level 5 you learn to do this in total silence, letting you lay traps without breaking stealth.
talents.name: Trap Launcher

talents.info_text:
Lay a simple yet effective trap that explodes on contact, doing 110, 217, 300, 369, 430 fire damage over a few turns in a radius of 2.

High level lure can trigger this trap.
talents.name: Explosion Trap

talents.info_text: Lay a bear trap. The first creature passing by will be caught in the trap, pinned and bleeding for 28, 55, 75, 93, 108 physical damage each turn for 5 turns.
talents.name: Bear Trap

talents.info_text: Lay a catapult trap that knocks back any creature that steps over it up to 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 grids away, dazing them.
talents.name: Catapult Trap

talents.info_text: Lay a tricky trap that maims the arms of creatures passing by with acid doing 150, 271, 363, 441, 510 damage and disarming them for 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.
talents.name: Disarming Trap

talents.info_text: Lay a trap coated with a potent venom, doing 120, 254, 357, 444, 520 nature damage to a creature passing by and stunning it for 4 turns.
talents.name: Nightshade Trap

talents.info_text:
Lay a trap that explodes in a radius of 2, blinding or dazing anything caught inside for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns.

The duration increases with Trap Mastery.

All foes caught inside take 53, 98, 132, 161, 187 physical damage.

High level lure can trigger this trap.
talents.name: Flash Bang Trap

talents.info_text:
Lay a trap that explodes in a radius of 3, releasing a thick poisonous cloud lasting 4 turns.

Each turn, the cloud infects all creatures with a poison that deals 70, 137, 188, 232, 270 nature damage over 5 turns.

High level lure can trigger this trap.
talents.name: Poison Gas Trap

talents.info_text:
Lay a trap that creates a gravitic anomaly, pulling in all foes around it in a radius of 5.

All foes caught inside take 45, 79, 104, 126, 145 temporal damage per turn.
talents.name: Gravitic Trap
